DOC.brief_summary: This trial compare novel form rTMS , intermittent Theta Burst Stimulation standard conventional high frequency leave sided stimulation protocol . The Left dorsolateral prefrontal cortex site stimulation treatment condition . The site stimulation target use MRI co-registration . The study seek determine two treatment protocol similar effectiveness treat major depression .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Conventional v Theta Burst rTMS
DOC.criteria: outpatient voluntary competent consent MiniInternational Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) confirm diagnosis MDD , single , recurrent age 1865 fail achieve clinical response adequate dose antidepressant base Antidepressant Treatment History Form ( ATHF ) score ≥ 3 current episode unable tolerate least 2 separate trial antidepressant inadequate dose duration ( ATHF 1 2 ) score ≥ 18 HAMD17 item increase initiation psychotropic medication 4 week prior screen able adhere treatment schedule Pass TMS adult safety screening ( TASS ) questionnaire normal thyroid function base prestudy blood work history substance dependence abuse within last 3 month concomitant major unstable medical illness , cardiac pacemaker implant medication pump active suicidal intent pregnant lifetime MINI diagnosis bipolar I II disorder , schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , schizophreniform , delusional disorder , current psychotic symptom MINI diagnosis obsessivecompulsive disorder , posttraumatic stress disorder ( current within last year ) , anxiety disorder ( generalize anxiety disorder , social anxiety disorder , panic disorder ) , dysthymia assess study investigator primary causing great impairment MDD
